documentation.text: @dev Set the beneficiary, start timestamp and vesting duration of the vesting wallet.

@dev Release the tokens that have already vested.
 Emits a {TokensReleased} event.
@dev Calculates the amount that has already vested. Default implementation is a linear vesting curve.
@dev Calculates the historical balance (current balance + already released balance).
@dev Set the beneficiary, start timestamp and vesting duration of the vesting wallet.

@dev Release the tokens that have already vested.
 Emits a {TokensReleased} event.
@dev Calculates the amount that has already vested. Default implementation is a linear vesting curve.
@dev Calculates the historical balance (current balance + already released balance).

devdoc.author: https://github.com/yograterol Custody of multiple tokens can be given to this contract, which will release the token to the beneficiary following a given vesting schedule. The vesting schedule is customizable through the {vestedAmount} function. Any token transferred to this contract will follow the vesting schedule as if they were locked from the beginning. Consequently, if the vesting has already started, any amount of tokens sent to this contract will (at least partly) be immediately releasable.
devdoc.details: This contract handles the vesting of ERC20 tokens for a given beneficiary.

constructor.details: Set the beneficiary, start timestamp and vesting duration of the vesting wallet.

release(address).details: Release the tokens that have already vested. Emits a {TokensReleased} event.

vestedAmount(address,uint256).details: Calculates the amount that has already vested. Default implementation is a linear vesting curve.

devdoc.title: ERC20VestingWallet
